languages.text: "Друкари ведь безобиден, пока Вольный Торговец здесь? Так ведь?"
"The Drukhari's harmless while the Rogue Trader's around, right? Right?"
languages.original_text: "Друкари ведь безобиден, пока Вольный Торговец здесь? Так ведь?"

traits.locale_text: "The Drukhari's harmless while the Rogue Trader's around, right? Right?"

languages.text: « Le Drukhari est inoffensif tant que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est dans les parages, hein ? C'est bien ça ? »
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari's harmless while the Rogue Trader's around, right? Right?"

traits.locale_text: « Le Drukhari est inoffensif tant que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} est dans les parages, hein ? C'est bien ça ? »

languages.text: «El Drukhari es inofensivo cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está cerca, ¿verdad? ¿Verdad?».
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari's harmless while the Rogue Trader's around, right? Right?"

traits.locale_text: «El Drukhari es inofensivo cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente está cerca, ¿verdad? ¿Verdad?».

languages.text: “只要行商浪人在附近，那个黑暗灵族就不会伤害任何人，是吧？是吧？”
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari's harmless while the Rogue Trader's around, right? Right?"

traits.locale_text: “只要行商浪人在附近，那个黑暗灵族就不会伤害任何人，是吧？是吧？”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーがいる限り、デュカーリは無害ですよね？」
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari's harmless while the Rogue Trader's around, right? Right?"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーがいる限り、デュカーリは無害ですよね？」

languages.text: "Der Drukhari ist harmlos, so lange {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} da ist, oder? Oder?"
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari's harmless while the Rogue Trader's around, right? Right?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Drukhari ist harmlos, so lange {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} da ist, oder? Oder?"

languages.text: "Hür Tacir mevcut olduğu sürece Drukhari'den zarar gelmez, değil mi? Değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "The Drukhari's harmless while the Rogue Trader's around, right? Right?"
